caption.title: Summary of Tribolium phenotypes resulting from RNAi-mediated depletion of mlpt, Tc-Ubr3, Tc-Svb, as well as those observed in Tc-Svb CRISPR mutants.
caption.p: In each case, a total of 20 animals were scored. Data show the average number of deleted abdominal segments, missing terminal appendages (urogomphi) and number of pairs of extra legs. Cuticle defects were scored as normal-looking (-), mild (+) and strong (+++) thinning. For leg length, the distance from coxa/trochanter joint to leg tip (see Figure 1) was measured in segment T3.
